name: Squish & Squash
description:
READ BEFORE PLAYING 

This is a 2 player coop game. 💕
It is best played with 2 controllers! You can also use one controller and a keyboard.

Description 🧲🧲

Squash bad Blobies with intense Magnetic Power!

This game was made in 2.5 days for a student game jam at Gobelins - L'école de l'Image.  
The rules were:  
- Shoot Them Up
- No Science Fiction
- Two players Coop
- Unity Engine

Controls 🎮🎮

The game is played best with two controllers

- Controller:  

A - Action  
Left Stick - Move

- Keyboard:

Space - Action  
Arrow keys or WASD or ZQSD - Move

Credits 🧾

HICHAME OUKDIM - DORIAN SIGNARGOUT - ORIANE REVOYRON  
Music by Reiswerk (Yume o Yume)
